item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Install pacakge can be installed with go get (go 1.22 or higher recommended): go get github.com/treeform-system/rootdb Features Currently the following features are supported SELECT INSERT CREATE Examples A simple usage would be: package main import ( "database/sql" "fmt" "log" _ "github.com/treeform-system/rootdb" ) func main() { fmt.Printf("Drivers=%#v\n", sql.Drivers()) db, err := sql.Open("rootdb", "example") if err != nil { log.Fatal(err) } defer db.Close() err = db.Ping() if err != nil { log.
